actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Armed Services.
Referred to Subcommittee on Military Personnel and Compensation.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Military Personnel and Compensation

official_title: A bill to prohibit the conversion of civilian or industrial type functions of the Department of Defense from performance by civilian employees to performance by contractors when such conversion would have a significant adverse effect on defense readiness.

summary.text: Prohibits the entry into commercial or industrial performance contracts for military installations if there is a substantial likelihood that performance of such function by the contractor would have a significant adverse effect on the ability of the commander of such an installation to meet mission requirements to be performed by civilian personnel.

titles.title: A bill to prohibit the conversion of civilian or industrial type functions of the Department of Defense from performance by civilian employees to performance by contractors when such conversion would have a significant adverse effect on defense readiness.
